Trigger.name: Is the Chief in state 2?

DisplayText.message: You are currently in Interrogation Mode. The image and name of the person you are interrogating will appear at the top. You can interrogate this person on any subject, by using any card at your disposal. You just have to scan it. There are no wrong questions-- all combinations are possible. You should now have on your board. Ask the Chief Officer what he knows about that woman.

Trigger.name: Is Notting hill open?

DisplayText.message: Look for the Notting Hill District among the London district cards and position it on the side of your Evidence Board. Now that you have the address, you can go there. Tap the "Goodbye" button to end the conversation and move to Notting Hill by scanning the Location Card.

Trigger.name: Has 5 minutes passed since this event was active?

DisplayText.message: Did you spot any clues? Scan the "Evidence Category" cards (the ones with a magnifying glass icon) that correspond to what you saw, or continue to observe the scene to find more evidence.

Trigger.name: Is the player in Notting Hill?
Has the dead cat been found?

DisplayText.message: The Doctor can help you by doing an autopsy and making medical observations. Scan the Doctor to call him, then scan the subject you want to discuss with him.

Trigger.name: Has Anna been found?

DisplayText.message: The Doctor can help you by doing an autopsy and making medical observations. Scan the doctor to call him, then scan the subject you want to discuss with him.

Trigger.name: Has the old phone been found?

DisplayText.message: The Hacker can help you with his technical knowledge and by doing information research. Scan the Hacker to call him, then scan the subject you want to discuss with him.

Trigger.name: Has the cake been found?

DisplayText.message: The Scientist can help you by doing a laboratory analysis or with scientific research. Scan the Scientist, then scan the subject you want to discuss with her.

Trigger.name: Has the bridge game been found?

DisplayText.message: The Criminologist can help you establish the psychological profile of a suspect or can aid you in putting an object into its sociological context. Scan the Criminologist to call him, then scan the subject you want to discuss with him.

Trigger.name: Has the Digitalis been found?

DisplayText.message: The symbol indicates that you have found a special subject of conversation. Find it in the "special item" deck and reveal it.

Trigger.name: Is Rose in the Vrai Nature state?

DisplayText.message: This letter makes you wonder if the suspect hasn't had a change of heart. Don't hesitate to re-interrogate them on certain subjects, they might be able to tell you more about them.

Trigger.name: Is Rose in the Guilty state?

DisplayText.message: Some texts will give you information that will alter the attitude of some suspects. Come back to interrogate them when you think you have made an important finding.

Trigger.name: Has a day, 11 hours, and 30 minutes passed since the game started?

DisplayText.message: Good start. When you're sure of your suspicions, go back to the Scotland Yard to give your report, and answer the questions to close the case.

Trigger.name: Has a day, 10 hours, and 30 minutes passed since the game started?

DisplayText.message: There are still many clues to be found at the crime scene. Don't hesitate to observe closer, and to turn around and look at your feet. Don't forget to scan the "Evidence Category" cards afterward in order to pick them up!

Trigger.name: Has any of the clues in the apartment been found?
Is the player in Notting Hills?

DisplayText.message: Select your actions carefully because time is running out. Each scan makes the clock in the upper-right corner move forward, and going to a location takes even longer. Some locations can be searched. In those situations a "Search for clues" button appears, indicating there is the possibility to search for clues in Virtual Reality. The victim's apartment has this button, so let's try it!

Trigger.name: Is the player in Leicester Square?

DisplayText.message: Scan the character once at the location to enter "interrogation" mode. Scan the interrogated character card again during interrogation mode to have him speak about himself.

Trigger.name: Is the player in Scotland Yard?

DisplayText.message: This game is a cooperative game where all players play together to solve a police investigation. Set up your Evidence Board, distribute the forensic contacts amongst all players and let's start! The Chief Officer is the character 33, signaled by. Pull him from the character deck and place him in the Scotland Yard. You should now go and talk to him. To do this you just have to scan the code on the character's card.

Trigger.name: Is Leicester Square still closed after a day and 11 hours?

DisplayText.message: The neighborhood investigation just finished. We learned that Anna Taylor was a Bridge player, often practicing in a club on Leicester Square

Trigger.name: Is Rose in the end state?

DisplayText.message: You have enough elements to solve this case. Go back to the Scotland Yard to give your report.

Trigger.name: Has it been a day, 9 hours, and 5 min, the player has not found Notting Hill, and not talking to the Chief?

DisplayText.message: To ask the police chief about the victim. First scan the Police chief, then scan the victim . He will tell you what he knows about her.

Trigger.name: Has it been a day, 9 hours, and 5 min, the player has not found Notting Hill, and is talking to the Chief?

DisplayText.message: To ask the police chief about the victim. Scan the victim. He will tell you what he knows about her.
